a gentle and loving touch or kiss: One of her gentle caresses touched the corner of his mouth. She closed her eyes, and lifted her face to the sun, enjoying its light, warm caress on her cheeks.
More examplesFewer examplesHe gave her a soft caress on the cheek and then walked to the front of the cave.He could use some help, a kind word, a gentle caress.He heard a soft purring and felt the warm caress of a cat rubbing his legs.
